thread.section_title: The Shower Doctor Ltd Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of showerdoc.com
thread.title: Clive Williams
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Clive Williams

author: Clive Williams
title: Clive Williams
text: The photos on the website are accurate and helped to select the correct parts. I ordered on Friday and received the parts in Saturday's post. Along with the video showing how to install the parts, the instructions are unambiguous and everything was straightforward. Brilliant!
